element.name: MessageId
element.comment: Unique Message Id as defined in Spec

element.name: Address
element.comment: IP address and number of CPU in format xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx:N

element.name: SampleType
element.comment: Sample type, 2 = Steel Sample, 3 = Slag Sample

element.name: SampleCounter
element.comment: Sample counter, one independent counter per sample type

element.name: MeasNo
element.comment: Measurement number, one independent counter per measurement type

element.name: ModeElec
element.comment: Mode, 0 = Manual Mode, 1 = Auto Mode, 2 = Computer Mode

element.name: ModeStirr
element.comment: Mode, 0 = Manual Mode, 1 = Auto Mode, 2 = Computer Mode

element.name: ModeMat
element.comment: Mode, 0 = Manual Mode, 1 = Auto Mode, 2 = Computer Mode

element.name: GantryPos
element.comment: Gantry position, 0 = Maintenance, 1 = Treatment Position 1, 2 = Treatment Position 2 (for twin shell units)

element.name: GantryPos
element.comment: Gantry Position, 0 = Maintenance position, 1 = Position 1, 2 = Position 2

element.name: PlugNo
element.comment: Plug that starts/stops, 1 = Plug 1, 2 = Plug 2, 3 = Plug 3 0 = All plugs

element.name: StirrStat
element.comment: Stirring status, 1 = Stirring start, 0 = Stirring stop

element.name: BypassStat
element.comment: Stirring bypass, 1 = Bypass On, 0 = Bypass Off

element.name: PlugDefect
element.comment: Plug defect at stirring end, 0 = No defect, 1 = Plug 1 defective, 2 = Plug 2, 3 = Plug 3 defective, 4 = Both Plugs defective

element.name: StirrGasType
element.comment: Gas type: 1 = Ar, 2 = N2, Field 1 = Plug1, Field 2 = Plug2, Field 3 = Plug3 Field 4 = Emergency Lance

element.name: StirrInt
element.comment: Stirring intensity [1 to 6 ], Field 1 = Plug1, Field 2 = Plug2,Field 3 = Plug3

element.name: FlowAct
element.comment: actual flow rate, Field 1 = Plug1, Field 2 = Plug2, Field 3 = Plug3, Field 4= Emergency Lance

element.name: Pressure
element.comment: actual pressure, Field 1 = Plug1, Field 2 = Plug2, Field 3 = Plug3, Field 4 = Emergency Lance

element.name: StirrGasCons
element.comment: Total consumption, Field 1 = Plug1, Field 2 = Plug2, Field 3 = Plug3, Field 3 = Emergency Lance

element.name: WGWaterInlet
element.comment: Waste Gas cooling water inlet temperature

element.name: WGWaterOutlet
element.comment: Waste Gas cooling water outlet temperature

element.name: WGWaterFlow
element.comment: Waste Gas cooling water flow total

element.name: ParamValue
element.comment: Parameter Value according to Parameter Name

element.name: Target
element.comment: Target Location Code: 1 = Intermediate LF hopper Treatment Position 1, 2 = Intermediate LF hopper Treatment Position 2, 3 = Ladle at LF Treatment Position 1, 4 = Ladle at LF Treatment Position 2, 5 = Weighing bin (general location for any of bins), 8 = Emergency location, 9 = Unknown

element.name: BatchStat
element.comment: Batch status (see Definition Classes) following batch handling, 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Processing Start, 3 = Weighed, 4 = Weighing complete, 5 = First Material in lower chamber, 6 = Discharge start, 7 = Weighing complete update, 8 = Last Material in lower chamber, 9 = Discharged

element.name: MatWeight
element.comment: Material Weight according to Material Code

element.name: FeedingRate
element.comment: Average feeding rate for wire materials

element.name: ActionFlag
element.comment: 1 = Message contains only changed materials, 0 = Message contains all materials

element.name: MinWeight
element.comment: Material Weight according to Material Code 0=material not available

element.name: Source
element.comment: Material source of Material Code, 1 = Bin, 2 = Hand, 3 = Wire

element.name: WeighingStat
element.comment: Weighing Status, 1 = Ladle weight of Return Heat, 2 = Ladle tare weight before tapping, 3 = Ladle gross weight after tapping, 4 = Ladle gross weight before LF, 5 = Ladle gross weight after LF, 6 = Gross weight update at LF, 7 = Ladle gross weight before casting, 8 = Ladle gross weight after casting, 9 = Ladle net weight after LF

element.name: Weight
element.comment: Ladle Weight according to weighing status

element.name: StepNo
element.comment: Steps number of treatment, 1 = Initial Heat, 2 = Main Heat, 3 = Final Heat, 4 = Temperature Hold, 5 = Soft Bubbling, 6 = Cooling, 7 = Cleanliness Bubbling
